long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CloudGuard mobile application allows you to configure access to a protected environment resource with Identity Safety and to set up a short-term dynamic access lease to your cloud resources.
More information can be found in our online help:
https://sc1.checkpoint.com/documents/CloudGuard_Dome9/Documentation/Network-Security/DynAccessLease.htm
